title: DO. NOT. FUCK. UP. TRYNDAMERE.                                       PLEASE

replies.body: He is getting a total redesign eventually, his kit is a dinosaur with zero skill/counterplay, his only purpose is split-pushing, and his visuals are horrible.
He needs a VGU. Guy is cancer when he's doing well, and utter garbage when he's not.

I tried him on PBE with the new Infinity Edge.
Infinity Edge's Double Crit Passive actually applies to his passive. Witha Full Resource bar, Tryndamere will have 70% Crit Chance after buying Infinity Edge.

> [{quoted}](name=Gilver,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=gbny5BEM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-05-02T20:09:33.375+0000)
>
> I tried him on PBE with the new Infinity Edge.
> Infinity Edge's Double Crit Passive actually applies to his passive. Witha Full Resource bar, Tryndamere will have 70% Crit Chance after buying Infinity Edge.

I'm wondering if it's even going to be possible to itemize against at 100% AD team after this patch. It should be an insta loss if the enemy team builds right, I doubt that'll be the case anymore.
i will not lie he is a fun champ but NGL he needs changes to how he determines the lane
